verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him, O ye servants <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Ye that stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>,

Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3050><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto his name <S%H8034><s%>; for it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3050><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> unto himself, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for his peculiar treasure <S%H5459><s%>.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%>, and that our YY <S%H113><s%> is above all 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Whatsoever the YY <S%H3068><s%> pleased <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and in earth <S%H776><s%>, in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and all deep places <S%H8415><s%>.

He causeht the vapours <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; he maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain <S%H4306><s%>; he bringeth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries <S%H214><s%>.
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>.

Who sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> tokens <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, O Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> mighty <S%H6099><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>;
Sichon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>:
And gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for an heritage <S%H5159><s%>, an heritage <S%H5159><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>; and thy memorial <S%H2143><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, and he will repent <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself concerning his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of men's <S%H120><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>.
They have mouths <S%H6310><s%>, but they speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> not; eyes <S%H5869><s%> have they, but they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not;
They have ears <S%H241><s%>, but they hear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not; neither is there <S%H3426><s%> any breath <S%H7307><s%> in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>.
They that make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in them.

Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>:

Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>: ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> out of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, which dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>.
